str2: From paraballo; a similitude, i.e. fictitious narrative, apothegm or adage.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
